Dorsal tegmental nucleus pars dorsalis.Synonym: Dorsal tegmental nucleus of Gudden pars dorsalis
DefiningCitation: K. Comparative cytoarchitectronic study of Gudden's tegmental nuclei in some mammals. J Comp Neurol 216: 233-244
Dorsal tegmental nucleus pars dorsalis.Definition: Part of dorsal tegmental nucleus characterized by round, small cells that are lightly stained in Nissl preparations.
